sourcesContent:
import { useState, useRef } from "react"; const ChatInputBox = ({ messages, sendMessage }) => { const [inputMsg, setInputMsg] = useState(""); const onSubmit = () => { sendMessage([...messages, { body: inputMsg, type: 1 }]); }; const handleKeyPress = (e) => { } return (
setInputMsg(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={handleKeyPress} />
); }; export default ChatInputBox;
